revision.text:
{{codepointer|Doom|Monster AI}}'''A_FatRaise''' {{doomwiki|A_FatRaise}}
(no parameters)
Plays the sound "fatso/raiseguns" and calls [[A_FaceTarget]].
== Examples == This example is taken from Doom's [[Classes:Fatso|Mancubus]].
Missile: FATT G 20 [[A_FatRaise]] FATT H 10 bright [[A_FatAttack1]] // See [[Classes:FatShot|FatShot]] FATT IG 5 [[A_FaceTarget]] FATT H 10 bright [[A_FatAttack2]] FATT IG 5 [[A_FaceTarget]] FATT H 10 bright [[A_FatAttack3]] FATT IG 5 [[A_FaceTarget]] goto See
